channel.title: Jobuary2026 on Carleton Computer Science Society
channel.description: Recent content in Jobuary2026 on Carleton Computer Science Society

item.title: Computer Networks Hackathon
item.description: Registration Deadline - Jan 28th by Midnight Please register for the event here → Computer Networks Hackathon - Registration Form Running in collaboration with SSi Canada, you’ll have the chance to connect with their CEO Jeff Philipp, Head of Software Development Thomas Cort, and Senior Software Developer Chris Bark, as well as learn more about student employment opportunities with the company.

item.title: Winter General Meeting
item.description: We will also be voting on some constitution changes -> Proposed CCSS Constitution (January 2026

item.title: Resume Review Service
item.description: Submit your Resume Here Submissions are now closed Please ensure you share a valid email address along with your resume. We’ll email you any feedback for improving your resume. Resumes will be reviewed on a first come first served basis. We will do our best to send you feedback within a couple of days, however depending on the volume of submissions we may need more time.
